item.title: How Ontario Aims to Lead the World in Sustainable Filmmaking
item.description: From on-set waste diversion to clean power solutions, Film Commissioner Justin Cutler discusses how the province is building a greener, smarter production hub — one initiative at a time.

item.title: Nepo: The Next Generation
item.description: Some of them are clearly talented. Some are still learning. All of them are connected by bloodline. And in today’s Hollywood, DNA matters

item.title: AI Isn’t Coming for Hollywood. It Has Already Arrived
item.description: An early winner in the generative AI wars was near collapse—then bet everything on a star-studded comeback. Can Stability AI beat the competition?

item.title: Americans Are Obsessed With Watching Short Video Dramas From China
item.description: How did steamy, short soap operas that originated in China become the hottest thing in Hollywood, seemingly overnight?
